title: I feel like everyone would enjoy this game more if they erased their expectations of other people
body:
Excluding ranked of course. Them thars the srz bzns land.

But like, while playing mainly Soraka and getting a 30-40% win rate I've discovered that this game becomes infinitely more enjoyable once you mellow out and just accept each individual game for what it is. As Soraka, people are more likely to expect you to fail, they never notice your ult and they just assume you're already a drain.

So all I need  to do is just keep 3/3 wards up along with the occasional pink, and everyone else seems content to just ignore me. And if I do end up dying, a quick team-wide mute for the duration of the spawn timer typically solves any potential flaming.
